title: CRM at Keells Miriswatta
body_lines: Nations Trust Bank continues to expand its customer centric banking solutions with the installation of the latest Cash Deposits and Withdrawal machine at the Keells Supermarket in Miriswatta, Gampaha. The unique CRM machine, equipped with a myriad of self-service digital banking capabilities, was unveiled by Arosha Liyanaarachchi, SVP – Commercial Banking – Nations Trust Bank and Anoma Wijesinghe, Regional Manager – Keells on the 23rd of May, 2022.

This new addition to the Bank’s ATM network ensures a seamless banking experience for the customer on-the-go by incorporating cutting edge IoT (Internet of Things) solutions paired with safety measures adhering to the new normal. The Nations Trust Bank ATM network currently includes 95 ATMs and 66 Cash Deposit & Withdrawal Machines, in addition to the 3,700+ ATMs on the Lanka Pay Network.
